FirstLaunch.first_launch_notification_label: Oh, this is your first time launching Emilia, let's set it up?
FirstLaunch.third_page:
Find a character you like and add a voice to it
After you have added it, you can close this window and select your character
FirstLaunch.use_characterai: Receive the token in the window that opens
FirstLaunch.token_saved: The token has been successfully saved
FirstLaunch.use_gemini:
Get the API key in an open browser window and enter it here
Also don't forget to enter the voice for Gemini

MainWindow.voice_id_tooltip:
You can leave it empty,
The built-in voice of the character will be used

About.whats_new:
:
• Now you can use voices from Character.AI, you can choose in the parameters
• Emilia: Character Search - new character editor
In it you can find a character or select it from recent and recommended chats
• Emilia: Voice Search - will allow you to find a voice for the selected character
You can listen to an example of a voice right in the window!
• Redesigned the first launch window, reduced the number of windows that open, the search for characters is built in
• Emilia_CharacterAI.the zip version of Emilia, optimized for use only with Character.AI
Emilia_CharacterAI.exe - the same as the first one, but in exe format, which allows you not to install Python
About.show_all_releases: To view all previous releases, click here
About.emilia_is_open_source:
Emilia is an open source project that allows you to talk to your favorite Waifu.
At the moment you are using the
About.use_version: , which is distributed completely free of charge on GitHub under the MIT License
